verses.text: \w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Jeremias \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H0834"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Palestine, \w before|strong="H2962"\w* Pharao \w took|strong="H0853"\w* \w Gaza|strong="H5804"\w*.

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w out|strong="H2199"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w overflowing|strong="H7857"\w* torrent, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* cover \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* therein, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* thereof: \w then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H0120"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w cry|strong="H2199"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w howl|strong="H3213"\w*,

\w At|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* marching \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w arms|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* soldiers, \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* rushing \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w wheels|strong="H1534"\w*. \w The|strong="H0413"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w have|strong="H0001"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w looked|strong="H6437"\w* \w back|strong="H6437"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \w for|strong="H0413"\w* feebleness \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*,

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w coming|strong="H0935"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* which \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w laid|strong="H0935"\w* \w waste|strong="H7703"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w Tyre|strong="H6865"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w Sidon|strong="H6721"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H7703"\w*, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w rest|strong="H7611"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w helpers|strong="H5826"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath wasted \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* isle \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Cappadocia.

\w Baldness|strong="H7144"\w* \w is|strong="H0935"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H0935"\w* \w Gaza|strong="H5804"\w*: Ascalon hath held \w her|strong="H0413"\w* peace \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* \w of|strong="H6010"\w* \w their|strong="H0935"\w* \w valley|strong="H6010"\w*: \w how|strong="H4970"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* shalt thou \w cut|strong="H1820"\w* thyself?

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* thou \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w how|strong="H0575"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* wilt thou \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w quiet|strong="H8252"\w*? \w Go|strong="H0622"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* thy scabbard, \w rest|strong="H8252"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w still|strong="H8252"\w*.

\w How|strong="H0349"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H8033"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w quiet|strong="H8252"\w*, \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w given|strong="H6680"\w* \w it|strong="H8033"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w charge|strong="H6680"\w* \w against|strong="H0413"\w* Ascalon, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* countries thereof \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w side|strong="H3220"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* hath \w made|strong="H3259"\w* \w an|strong="H8033"\w* \w appointment|strong="H3259"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w it|strong="H8033"\w*?
